nodes.name: SponsoredEvent

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "not enough to cover sign-up fee"

nodes.name: signUpForEvent
pledge

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "account has already completed the event"

arguments.value: account has already completed the event

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "account has already completed the event"

nodes.documentation:
@notice Mark the participant as having completed the event
   * **NOTE: This version doesn't allow partial completion**
   *  * modifier: `onlyOwner` Only the organiser of this event may call this
 * modifier: `onlyActive` Only events that have not ended
   * @param _participantIds Array of participants who have completed the event
nodes.name: participantCompleted

nodes.documentation:
@notice End the event
   *  * Transfer valid funds and sign-up fees to recipient
 * Mark this event as ended
   *  * modifier: `onlyOwner` Only the organiser of this event may call this
 * modifier: `onlyActive` Only events that have not ended
nodes.name: endEvent

nodes.documentation:
@notice Transfer the money to the recipient
   *  - Transfer the balance of pledges given to 
   participants who completed the event
   to the intended recipient and end the event.
 - Mark the event as ended
   *  * modifier: `onlyOwner` Only the organiser of this event may call this
 * modifier: `onlyActive` Only events that have not ended
nodes.name: transferToRecipient

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "pledges can only be reclaimed by the original sponsor"

arguments.value: pledges can only be reclaimed by the original sponsor

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "pledges can only be reclaimed by the original sponsor"

nodes.documentation:
@notice Reclaim pledge
   * After the event has ended, if the participant did not
complete the event, the sponsor can reclaim the pledge
or send it to the recipient anyway
   *  * modifier: `onlyEnded` This event must have passed
 * modifier: `onlyUnclosed` This contract is still open
   * @param _returnPledge Should this be returned to the sponsor?
nodes.name: sponsorReclaim

nodes.documentation:
@notice Transfers any outstanding funds and closes the contract
   * Any funds remaining in the contract by the time this is called
will be transferred to the recipient regardless of the
participant's completion status

   *  * modifier: `onlyEnded` This event must have passed
 * modifier: `onlyUnclosed` This contract is still open
nodes.name: closeEvent

nodes.documentation:
@notice Cancel the event
   *  * Transfer all the pledged money back to the sponsors
 * Transfer the sign-up fee back to the participant

   *  * modifier: `onlyOwner` Only the organiser of this event may call this
 * modifier: `onlyActive` Only events that have not ended
nodes.name: cancelEvent

@notice Cancel the event

 * Transfer the sign-up fee back to the participant

nodes.name: cancelEvent

params._eventName: Public name of the Sponsored Event
params._recipientAddress: where the money goes at the end
params._recipientName: Public name of the Recipient of the funds
params._signUpFee: Fee paid by the participants to join

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._participantIds: Array of participants who have completed the event

params._participantId: Index of the participant in the participantIndex

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._participantName: Public name of the event participant

params._returnPledge: Should this be returned to the sponsor?

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

cancelEvent().notice: Cancel the event   *  * Transfer all the pledged money back to the sponsors * Transfer the sign-up fee back to the participant    *  * modifier: `onlyOwner` Only the organiser of this event may call this * modifier: `onlyActive` Only events that have not ended

closeEvent().notice: Transfers any outstanding funds and closes the contract   * Any funds remaining in the contract by the time this is called will be transferred to the recipient regardless of the participant's completion status    *  * modifier: `onlyEnded` This event must have passed * modifier: `onlyUnclosed` This contract is still open

methods.constructor: Creates a SponsoredEvent contract   * Each SponsoredEvent has:   *  - An organiser - A recipient

endEvent().notice: End the event   *  * Transfer valid funds and sign-up fees to recipient * Mark this event as ended   *  * modifier: `onlyOwner` Only the organiser of this event may call this * modifier: `onlyActive` Only events that have not ended

participantCompleted(address[]).notice: Mark the participant as having completed the event   * **NOTE: This version doesn't allow partial completion**   *  * modifier: `onlyOwner` Only the organiser of this event may call this * modifier: `onlyActive` Only events that have not ended

pledge(uint256,string).notice: Transfer money from the sponsor to the contract

signUpForEvent(string).notice: Join an event by providing a name and transferring the minimum sign-up fee

sponsorReclaim(uint256,bool).notice: Reclaim pledge   * After the event has ended, if the participant did not complete the event, the sponsor can reclaim the pledge or send it to the recipient anyway   *  * modifier: `onlyEnded` This event must have passed * modifier: `onlyUnclosed` This contract is still open
